Proficient in JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, and Firebase, with expertise in ERP, CRM, and E-commerce platforms, including Salesforce Commerce Cloud (Demandware). Proven ability to lead product development, design robust backend services, build intuitive frontend interfaces, and integrate third-party APIs in fast-paced startup environments.
